q: . Eric Schmidt is now executive chairman, focusing on external relationships like deals, partnerships and nipping out on sandwich runs. Eric Schmidt said Google is growing by 20 per cent around the world, but added, We don't have to do everything. Which is news to those worried that the Big G is taking over the world one email address at a time. Do you think Facebook and other closed networks should make your information available through Google?

I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. Forget any individual opponent, says Zimmerman, Kirsten Gillibrand came in facing an entire political culture that was trying to count her out. But critics misread her. Hailing from a prominent political family, Kirsten Gillibrand possesses a bred-in-the-bones understanding of the game.
